channel.title: Answering a question when it's already answered
channel.description:
Figured I should post this too..
I don't think you should post the same thing or answer a question when it was already answered. Your basically posting the same thing the person did above you.
It's spam and theres no point. If anybody disagrees with me feel free to voice your opinion.
And on a side note, *ahem* http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,68842.0.html
:|
Kind of falls into this, if you decide to go against this and just post anyway don't flame.
